meanings.meaning_en_US: Well-known from long or close association.

examples.sentence: This place looks [familiar] to me.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個地方對我來說看起來很熟悉

examples.sentence: He has a [familiar] face.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他有一張熟悉的面孔

examples.sentence: The concept was [familiar] to her.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個概念對她來說是熟悉的

meanings.meaning_en_US: A close friend or associate.

examples.sentence: She is a [familiar] to him from school.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是他從學校就認識的熟人

examples.sentence: They were once [familiars] in the same circle.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們曾經是同一圈子裡的熟人

examples.sentence: He took advice from his [familiar].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他向他的熟人請教建議

meanings.meaning_en_US: Up to the time of.

examples.sentence: We will wait [till] she arrives.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們會等直到她到達。

examples.sentence: You can stay [till] the end of the show.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以待到節目結束。

examples.sentence: I won't leave [till] I finish my work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我不會離開直到我完成工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The act of allowing someone to enter a place or to be accepted into a group.

examples.sentence: Her [admission] to the school was a surprise.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她被該校接納讓人驚訝

examples.sentence: The ticket price includes [admission] to the museum.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 票價包含了進入博物館的費用

examples.sentence: He made a public [admission] of his mistakes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他公開承認了自己的錯誤

meanings.meaning_en_US: An act of defeating an enemy or opponent in a battle, game, or other competition.

examples.sentence: The team celebrated their [victory] over their rivals.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 球隊慶祝戰勝對手的勝利。

examples.sentence: Her victory in the competition was well-deserved.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在比賽中的勝利是當之無愧的。

examples.sentence: The victory brought joy to the entire community.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 勝利帶給整個社區的歡樂。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The unlawful use of violence and intimidation, especially against civilians, in pursuit of political aims.

examples.sentence: Countries work together to combat [terrorism].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 各國共同努力打擊恐怖主義。

examples.sentence: He studies the impacts of [terrorism] on society.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他研究恐怖主義對社會的影響。

examples.sentence: The government has measures to address [terrorism].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 政府有措施應對恐怖主義。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A marine mammal that is usually found in cold waters and has a streamlined body.

examples.sentence: The [seal] swam gracefully in the ocean.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 海豹在海洋中優雅地游泳。

examples.sentence: We saw a [seal] on the rocks.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在岩石上看到了一隻海豹。

examples.sentence: The documentary featured a colony of [seals].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這部紀錄片展示了一群海豹。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To close securely, usually referring to an envelope or container.

examples.sentence: Please [seal] the envelope before sending it.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在寄出之前密封信封。

examples.sentence: Make sure to [seal] the jar tightly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保瓶子密封得緊緊的。

examples.sentence: They used wax to [seal] the letter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們用蠟來封住信件。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A legally recognized subject or national of a state.

examples.sentence: Every [citizen] has the right to vote.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位公民都有投票權。

examples.sentence: As a [citizen], she is proud to serve her country.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 作為一名公民，她為能服務國家感到自豪。

examples.sentence: He fulfilled his duties as a [citizen].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他履行了作為公民的責任。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Complete and total; not limited in any way.

examples.sentence: She has absolute confidence in her abilities.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對自己的能力有絕對的信心。

examples.sentence: The rules are absolute and cannot be changed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些規則是絕對的，無法更改。

examples.sentence: He demanded absolute loyalty from his team.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他要求他的團隊有絕對的忠誠。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A particular kind of matter with uniform properties.

examples.sentence: The chemical [substance] was hazardous.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這種化學物質是有害的。

examples.sentence: Water is a vital [substance] for life.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 水是生命所需的重要物質。

examples.sentence: We studied different types of [substances] in science class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在科學課上學習了不同類型的物質。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A flat surface or platform that forms the top of a ship's hull.

examples.sentence: The captain stood on the [deck] to address the crew.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 船長站在甲板上向船員講話。

examples.sentence: We enjoyed the sunset as we sat on the [deck].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們坐在甲板上欣賞日落。

examples.sentence: The ship's [deck] was covered with passengers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 船的甲板上擠滿了乘客。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A public display of works of art or items of interest.

examples.sentence: The art [exhibition] attracted many visitors.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這場藝術展覽吸引了許多遊客。

examples.sentence: She hosted an [exhibition] of her photography.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她舉辦了一個自己的攝影展覽。

examples.sentence: The science museum is holding an [exhibition] on space.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 科學博物館正在舉辦一個關於太空的展覽。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A quantity of a medicine or drug taken at one time.

examples.sentence: The doctor prescribed a [dose] of medication.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 醫生開了一劑藥。

examples.sentence: He took a double [dose] for his headache.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他為了頭痛服用了雙倍劑量。

examples.sentence: Each [dose] should be taken with water.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每劑都應該配水服用。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to the tropics, characterized by a warm climate.

examples.sentence: The [tropical] rainforest is rich in biodiversity.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 熱帶雨林擁有豐富的生物多樣性。

examples.sentence: They love to vacation in [tropical] regions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們喜歡在熱帶地區度假。

examples.sentence: The [tropical] climate supports many unique species.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 熱帶氣候支持許多獨特的物種。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To risk money or valuables on the outcome of a future event.

examples.sentence: I [bet] five dollars on the game.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我在比賽上賭了五美元。

examples.sentence: She [bet] that her team would win.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她打賭她的隊伍會贏。

examples.sentence: They [bet] against the odds.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們以懷疑的態度賭博。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A general direction in which something is developing or changing.

examples.sentence: The fashion industry is always changing its [trend].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 時尚產業總是在改變其趨勢。

examples.sentence: Social media has influenced current [trend] significantly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 社交媒體顯著影響了目前的趨勢。

examples.sentence: He followed the latest [trend] in technology.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他跟隨了科技最新的趨勢。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Able to be seen; perceptible with the eye.

examples.sentence: The stars are visible in the night sky.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 夜空中的星星是可見的。

examples.sentence: Make sure the signs are [visible] to drivers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保標誌對駕駛者是可見的。

examples.sentence: His progress was clearly [visible] to everyone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的進步對每個人都非常明顯。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of poorer quality or lower standard; more serious or severe.

examples.sentence: The situation is getting [worse].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 情況變得更差了。

examples.sentence: His grades are [worse] than last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的成績比去年更差。

examples.sentence: This is a [worse] outcome than we expected.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是比我們預期的更差的結果。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person or device that receives something.

examples.sentence: She is the designated [receiver] of the package.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是包裹的指定接收者

examples.sentence: The television [receiver] must be turned on to watch channels.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 必須打開電視接收器才能觀看頻道

examples.sentence: In communication systems, the [receiver] processes the incoming signals.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在通信系統中，接收器處理進來的信號
